Title: Tales from the Rift
Writer: Aaron Lam, Ivan Raimi (developed for television by), Sam Raimi (developed for television by), Tom Spezialy (developed for television by)
Actors: Bruce Campbell, Ray Santiago, Dana DeLorenzo, Arielle Carver-O'Neill
Plot: Ash's bond with his daughter strengthens as more Knights of Sumeria join Pablo and him to defeat evil; Kelly decides to go after Ruby while Ash, team, and the knights enter the rift and face a battle of their own.
